description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: Updated as of: May 18th, 2025
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
Percentage watched by me: 56%.
* Barbie is #1 with 5,35M views
* Hotel Transylvania is #500 with 1,04M views
Monthly changes:
* Mickey 17 (#379) and Hotel Transylvania (#499) are new on this list. Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri and Dawn of the Planet of the Apes are out
* Conclave (+72), Princess Mononoke (+12), Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (+11), White Chicks (+10), The Virgin Suicides (+10) and Gladiator II (+10) gained the most spots
* Solo: A Star Wars Story (-13), Marriage Story (-10), The Shape of Water (-9) and The Favourite (-8) lost the most spots
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Ford v Ferrari (1,039M views)
* Dirty Dancing (1,038M views)
* Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (1,033M views)
* John Wick: Chapter 4 (1,030M views)
* Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (1,025M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* The Wild Robot (1,01M views)
* Thunderbolts* (741K views)
* A Minecraft Movie (854K views)
